path.plural: Argument Error: -p --path argument should be singular
path.cap: Argument Error: -p --path argument should be all lowercase
path.symbol: Symbol Error: -p --path [pathName] pathName should be in the format of directory to start in, not a symbol
path.argument: Argument Error: path should be in format of -p --path [pathName]
path.multiple: Argument Error: --path should not have more than one directory to start
path.dir: Path Error: path name not valid path

sort.plural: Argument Error: -s --sort argument should be singular
sort.cap: Argument Error: -s --sort argument should be all lowercase
sort.type: Symbol Error: -s --sort [type] type should be either alpha or size if using explicit sort type
sort.format: Argument Error: sort should be in format of -s or --sort
sort.multiple: Argument Error: -s --sort [type] should only have one type to sort from alpha OR size

metric.plural: Argument Error: -m --metric argument should be singular
metric.cap: Argument Error: -m --metric argument should be all lowercase
metric.format: Format Error: metric should be in the form of -m --metric
metric.argument: Argument Error: -m --metric does not accept arguments, only use -m or --metric

threshold.plural: Argument Error: -t --threshold argument should be singular
threshold.cap: Argument Error: -t --threshold argument should be all lowercase
threshold.number: Symbol Error: -t --threshold [thresholdVal] type should be a positive integer
threshold.format: Format Error: threshold command be in format of -t or --threshold
threshold.multiple: Argument Error: -t --threshold [thresholdVal] should only have one threshold value instead of multiple

language.plural: Argument Error: -l --lang argument should be singular
language.cap: Argument Error: -l --lang argument should be all lowercase
language.type: Symbol Error: -l --lang [languageCode] type should be either en (English), de (German), fr (French), or ro (Romanian)
language.format: Format Error: lang command should be in format of -l or --lang
language.multiple: Argument Error: -l --lang [languageCode] should only have one language code value

help.plural: Plural Error: -h --help argument should be singular
help.cap: Capitalization Error: -h --help argument should be all lowercase
help.format: Format Error: help command should be in format of -h or --help
help.argument: Argument Error: -h --help has no additional arguments

first.cap: Capitalization Error: -f --first argument should be all lowercase
first.format: Format Error: first command should be in format of -f or --first
first.argument: Argument Error: -f --first [filesOrDirs] has only 1 argument, please use files or dirs
